name: ckbk
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. k. b. k.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The ckbk skill for Amazon Alexa brings the best cookbook recipes from trusted chefs and authors to your Alexa-enabled device. The skill gives access to the most popular recipes from ckbk's digital subscription service, often described as "like Spotify for cookbooks". 
ckbk's recipes cover a huge range of international cuisines, and every culinary specialty from baking to BBQ and beyond. The recipes are enhanced with step-by-step voice instructions, and there's no need to touch the screen, just move through the recipe at your own pace by saying "next step" when you are ready to move on.


Just ask to open c. k. b. k. and then ask for the dish you would like to cook.

Optionally link the skill to your ckbk account for easy access to your favorites.
